Package modele.traitement

Class Graphe

java.lang.Object
modele.traitement.Graphe
public class Graphe extends Object
Class representing a graph
Author:
Groupe SAE PNR 1D1

  • Constructor Details

    • Graphe

      public Graphe(ArrayList<Sommet> sommets, double dist) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Construct a graph from a list of vertices and a minimal distance
      Parameters:
      sommets - List of vertices
      dist - Minimal distance between two vertices to be neighbours
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the list of vertices is null or if the minimal distance is negative

    • Graphe

      public Graphe(HashMap<Sommet,ArrayList<Sommet>> somVoisins) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Construct a graph from a Hashmap containing the nodes of the graph as keys and their neighbours as values
      Parameters:
      somVoisins - Hashmap containing the nodes of the graph as keys and their neighbours as values
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the Hashmap is null or if it contains null keys or null values

    • Graphe

      public Graphe(Graphe g)
      Copy-constructor for a graph
      Parameters:
      g - Graph to be copied
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the graph is null

      Check if a vertex is a neighbour of another
      Parameters:
      idSom1 - ID of the first vertex
      idSom2 - ID of the second vertex
      Returns:
      True if the second vertex is a neighbour of the first, false otherwise

      Gets the minimum distance between two vertices

      idSom2 - the id of the second vertex
      Returns:
      the distance separating the vertices

    • excentricite

      public int excentricite(int idSom)
      Calculates the maximum number of edges of the path between the parameter vertex and the other vertices of the graph. Works only with related graphs, otherwise returns -1.
      Parameters:
      idSom - Vertex identifier
      Returns:
      The eccentricity of the vertex or -1 if the function is used in an unconnected graph.

    • rayon

      public int rayon()
      Calculate the smallest exentricity of the graph
      Returns:
      Radius of the graph
